issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Busy indicator is wobbly for transitional items on landing pages (tile view)

comments.body: I just tested master in Safari, FF and Chrome and it looks good (no wobble). What branch did you test on?

[~dkavanagh]: I used latest master, tested with the instances and volumes landing page on latest Safari and Firefox on OS 10.10.  Note that the busy indicator is wobbly on the *tile* view, not the table view.
That's where I tested because I saw your screenshot. (tile view)
[~alice], [~ccassler], can you please test on a couple different browsers from master branch? We need more confirmation. Thanks!
[~dkavanagh] I'll test on Windows IE, FF tomorrow. I'll comment on what I find.
[~alice]: Were you able to reproduce the wobbly busy indicator on landing pages (tile view) or the dashboard?
[~kgill] I could not reproduce this.
[~alice]: What browser(s) did you test with?
[~kgill] I tested on OSX Yosemite on Firefox 37.0.2. Are you still seeing the issue?
[~alice]: I tested on Firefox 37 (OS X Yosemite) and am seeing the issue, although I wonder if a retina display has something to do with it.
[~kgill] I have retina display on my MBP. Is there anything special about your environment that I am possibly not replicating?
[~kgill] can you make a movie of the wobbling? is it happening each time?
[~alice]: I have attached a screen recording of the wobbly indicator
[~kgill] could it be some optical illusion? I watched the movie 2 times and the indicator does not look wobbly to me.
I'm with Alice on this one. Looks fine to me.
Perhaps we can have [~jloza] take a look at the attached movie.  The loading indicator circle is clearly wobbly while it's spinning.
Do you see it wobbling anywhere else or just on those tiles?
[~dkavanagh]: It wobbles when attaching/detaching a volume on the volumes landing page (tile view), and I suspect this issue affects any loading indicator in the title's status area on landing pages.
That's so small, I'm not sure if I see wobbling or not.

It's not wobbling, it's an optical illusion. Because the dots have variable sizes, the negative space inside the spinner appears to rotate on the center axis. If you zoom your screen to a larger size, you can see what it's doing. I might try a different FA spinner to see if we can avoid this.
changing icon to one with consistent sizing show tiny waver still, and part of icon was cut off. Kamal is going to try adjusting container size to see if that helps
Fixed in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1563 (note the branch is GUI-1715-patch, not GUI-1715)
UX review passed, ready for code review! Thanks, [~kgill]!
Released in 4.2
